lexUnit.name: breath.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an inhalation or exhalation of air from the lungs.

sentence.text: Cardiff turned back to the window and wiped the fog of his breath from the glass .

The Volvo fared little better but Donna closed her eyes tightly as the impact hurled her forward again and sent her crashing against the steering column with enough force to knock the breath from her .
The moon disappeared , and there was a slow , light wind , like the breath of a dying man , as Gabriel climbed the ladder and started thatching high up on top of the third rick .
For these women it seems to have been a breath of pure oxygen , heady with proposals for socialist-feminist action , at a time when Kinnockism is attempting to kill it off .
She sucked in her breath and shook her head .
She blew out her breath .
Taking a deep , calming breath , she closed the hatch , arranged the row of sugar bowls on a tray and determinedly walked out into the restaurant .
He drew a sharp , hissing breath and released her abruptly , while tears of bitterness filled her eyes .
Lambert took in a long , shuddering breath .
He blew out 59 with his first breath .
She sucked in a deep breath .
I blew my breath into him rhythmically , faster than normal breathing , squeezing him , telling him , ordering him in my mind to take charge of himself , come back , come back …
Maria dragged a breath into her lungs and managed a tight smile .
I waited to get my breath before cutting across the road .
On an inward breath pull them in tight .
Time the outward motion with your outward breath .
Squeeze them together again and on an outward breath let them go again .
She caught her breath .
Polly caught her breath , instinctively jerking backwards away from him .
Paige caught her breath .
He drew in deep , deep breaths of air ; then , almost quietly now , he told himself he must find Martin .
The man drew a long breath and spoke clearly .
Sophie drew a long breath , ` You have a great variety , but my veterinary training covers most of all these species .
The man had a rasping cough that exploded from his lungs in noisy barks which often left him groaning and gasping for breath .
Her father was choking for breath , clutching his throat as he fought for air .
Everywhere men held their breaths .
Alyssia held her breath for what seemed like minutes .
He held his breath .
Paige held her breath .
With a hissing intake of breath , Benny grabbed Petion 's arm , and pointed to the figure they had seen dragged into the open .
She heard the soft intake of his breath , then he was drawing her down on to the grass .
Jehan let out a breath .
Jack let his breath out on a sigh and shook his head .
` Leave me get a breath of air , and I 'll do that ! "
` I could do with a breath of fresh air . "
Kelsang Tabkay draws in a breath of the still , fresh air : this is home , where the one-time environmentalist now lives the tranquil life of a Buddhist monk .
She pulled harder at him , squeezed the very breath from his body .
She thought for a moment and blew her breath out over her lips .
I took deep breaths and felt for my moneybelt and the stiffness of traveller 's cheques secreted about me .
Andy took a deep breath and patted my head , chuckling .
She took another deep breath and glanced at her watch , her thoughts returning with a prick of concern to Emily and her imminent dental appointment .
Ashley took a shaky breath .
